abstract: Dow Jones is in talks to acquire the half of SmartMoney magazine that it doesn’t already own from the Hearst Corporation, The Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.
snippet: Dow Jones is in talks to acquire the half of SmartMoney magazine that it doesn’t already own from the Hearst Corporation, The Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Dow Jones is in talks to acquire the half of SmartMoney magazine that it doesn’t already own from the Hearst Corporation, The Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: Dow Jones Seeks to Buy Rest of SmartMoney
